room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Q: The Live Escape Experience in Fort Collins
room_description:
First, the crops failed. Crows and owls began to gather near the old tree by the cemetery. Then, our livestock began to die for no apparent cause. Next, a strange sickness afflicted the village. Ezekiel and Verity Mosely’s youngest daughter gave in to seizure during her recitation of the Lord’s Prayer. We know there can be only one explanation: a witch has brought unholy evil to our town.
The worst is yet to come. Our chapel has been defiled with a sinister curse that will take effect when the witch reaches the height of power at midnight this All Hallows Eve.
The witch of Blackstock must be found and the curse broken before midnight tonight or the darkness will claim us and the neighboring towns will burn our village to the ground with us in it…
